name: TUV SUD
description: In 1866, our founders had a bold vision to reduce the impact of technological risks and protect people, assets and the environment. More than 150 years on, sustainability and safety continue to be the backbone of our mission and services. Our aim is to inspire trust in technology, enabling progress by managing technology-related risks and facilitating change. This commitment is embodied in our claim “Add value. Inspire trust.” We work progressively towards being the trusted partner of choice for safety, security and sustainability solutions, adding tangible value to our clients globally. As we look towards the future, we believe that sustainability and digitalisation will continue to shape the narrative of commerce and society. Today, we are represented by more than 26,000 employees located across over 1,000 locations. Our community of experts is passionate about technology and is inspired by the possibilities of your business.
business_objectives: Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: Add value. Inspire trust.
ShortDescription: TÜV SÜD is the trusted partner of choice for safety, security and sustainability solutions.

Highlights.name: AUDITING AND SYSTEM CERTIFICATION
Highlights.description: TÜV SÜD is a global provider of auditing and certification services. Our in-depth knowledge of regulatory compliance around the world and our highly experienced auditors provide you with a fast, efficient service. We focus on helping you become more consistent, efficient and compliant – which means you bring products to market faster, avoid liabilities and boost profits.

Highlights.name: INSPECTION
Highlights.description: Having the right systems, processes and procedures ensures consistency that is critical in complying with relevant codes, requirements, regulations and standards. TÜV SÜD's end-to-end approach to inspection factors in accountability, consistency and compliance at every stage. Our services that include infrastructure and construction inspection, installed equipment inspection, factory inspection, hygiene inspection as well as pre- and post-shipment inspection.

Highlights.name: TECHNICAL ADVISORY
Highlights.description: With our multidisciplinary pool of experts located in 1,000 locations worldwide, we provide technical advisory services to optimise safety, quality and environmental protection programmes, while minimising risk for our clients. We support organisations in a wide range of industries with services from overseeing building and construction projects through to advising on energy management and business process optimisation. We also provide expert opinions and advice on market access issues.

Highlights.name: RISK MANAGEMENT AND PROPERTY LOSS CONTROL ENGINEERING
Highlights.description: TÜV SÜD provides “unbundled” property risk control programmes as an alternative to traditional programmes that depend on insurance companies and underwriters to evaluate risk and provide loss control. Offering a dedicated service team and the highest engineering expertise, we support you with  high quality risk analysis and in-depth risk management programmes to help you to reduce your property loss history and expectancy.

Highlights.name: TRAININGS
Highlights.description: TÜV SÜD helps people and organisations to drive business performance to levels of excellence. We provide effective global training programmes for individuals and whole organisations to support you in becoming an expert for your industry: from work safety, management systems and technical skills to high-level executive programmes. Our trainings and Personal Qualification Programs cover the entire scope of safety and security aspects according to relevant norms and standards.

enhanced_description: TÜV SÜD is a global provider of safety, security, and sustainability solutions, with a mission to inspire trust in technology and enable progress by managing technology-related risks. Established in 1866, their extensive expertise, spanning over 150 years, is delivered through a comprehensive suite of services including global auditing and system certification, end-to-end inspection services (e.g., infrastructure, construction, factory, hygiene, pre/post-shipment), technical advisory for optimizing safety, quality, and environmental protection programs, property risk management and loss control engineering, and expert training programs covering work safety, management systems, technical skills, and personal qualification according to relevant norms and standards. Operating across more than 1,000 locations with over 26,000 employees, TÜV SÜD supports organizations of all sizes, from small to global enterprises, in achieving regulatory compliance, efficiency, and reduced liabilities.
